instruction: Given a sentence in English(en), generate a translation of that sentence in Hindi(hi) without changing the meaning of the input sentence as the output
input: After this incident, Sardar Patel asked the Mudaliar brothers to personally ensure all assistance for development of Lakshadweep.
output: इस घटना के बाद सरदार पटेल ने Mudaliar brothers से कहा कि वे व्यक्तिगत रूप से ये सुनिश्चित करें कि लक्षद्वीप को विकास के लिए हर जरुरी मदद मिले

input: During one Udaasi, he widely travelled to Islamic countries including Saudi Arabia, Iraq and Afghanistan.
